participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, she loves to express herself through art and storytelling.
participant_1.background: I buy myself nice paper products to make myself feel like a kid again. I have two cats. My family is a family of storytellers, and we are all passionate about sharing our stories with the world. I used to travel the USA playing guitar. I'm happy to have a beautiful home and get to share my passion for gaming with others.

participant_2.name: Jacob
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and thoughtful, he enjoys exploring new ideas and living an active lifestyle.
participant_2.background: My stamp collection was stolen when my house was broken into. I can swim very fast. I work part time. I wake up early, meditate, and then have a healthy breakfast before starting my day. I love to go hiking.

content.text: What's something you've always wanted to do, but have yet to achieve?
I've always wanted to start my own business, but I just haven't had the time or energy.
It's never too late! I believe in you!
Thanks, I appreciate it! I think I'm ready to start taking some steps towards it.
That's great news! What kind of business are you thinking about starting?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm really interested in the food industry. Maybe I'll open a restaurant or a bakery.
Both of those sound amazing! I would love to come to your restaurant when you open it.
Thanks, I'll be sure to let you know!
What's your favorite thing to do on your days off?
I love to go hiking and swimming. I also love to spend time with my cats.
I love hiking too! I'm not much of a swimmer, but I love to go for walks on the beach.
I love the beach! I wish I lived closer to one.
Me too! I'm actually planning a trip to the beach next month.
I'll be sure to send you pictures!
Thanks, I can't wait to see them!
